successes.title: Woolet: The Slimmest Smart Wallet for the Modern Man
successes.description: A next generation wallet that keeps your cash and cards safe. Ultra slim, bluetooth-powered, self-charging & handcrafted to perfection.

Pledges.description:
THE RFID BLOCKING SLEEVE
One Woolet RFID Blocking Sleeve that protects you from RFID-skimming. No one is going to access your card inside this!

THE PHONE COVER
One Woolet cover of your choice for 4.7" or 5.5" Phones. Perfect for iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 Plus. Available in black and brown. Made from the same high-quality leather as Woolet. You'll protect your phone from drops and scratches!
(Please write to us which size + color you'd like)

THE KEY FINDER
One Woolet Key Finder with all the same capabilities as Woolet, including rechargeable battery. Never lose your keys again!

EARLY BIRD WOOLET BLACK
One sleek black Woolet with red stitching. Made from the finest quality hand-dressed calf leather.
Only 20 available!

2 KEY FINDERS + 2 RFID BLOCKING SLEEVE 
One Woolet Key Finder with all the same capabilities as Woolet, including rechargeable battery and Woolet RFID Blocking Sleeve that protects you from RFID-skimming. Never lose your keys again!

WOOLET BLACK
One sleek black Woolet with red stitching. Made from the finest quality hand-dressed calf leather.

EARLY BIRD WOOLET SPECIAL
One Woolet of your choice with a built-in speaker for customizable sound. Woolet can now make any sound you want, like the app.
Early access from April. Be the first to test drive Woolet with us! Limited to 20!

WOOLET BROWN 
One Woolet Brown - suede brown. Made from the finest quality hand-dressed calf leather.

SPECIAL BUNDLE BLACK
One sleek black Woolet with red stitching, plus one Woolet key finder sleek black. Made from the finest quality hand-dressed calf leather.

REQUESTED BUNDLE BLACK
One sleek Black Woolet with red stitching + one Black Woolet Phone Cover for 4,7 or 5,5 phones, perfect for iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 plus.

Made from the fines quality hand-dressed calf leather
(Please write to us which size)

SPECIAL BUNDLE BROWN
One Woolet Brown - suede brown plus one Woolet key finder brown. Made from the finest quality hand-dressed calf leather.

REQUESTED BUNDLE BROWN
One sleek Brown Suede Woolet  + one Brown Woolet Phone Cover for 4,7 or 5,5 phones, perfect for iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 plus.

Made from the fines quality hand-dressed calf leather
(Please write to us which size)
